channel.title: Is there an Item "Heartsong Elixer"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Is there an Item "Heartsong Elixer"" - Different from "Heartsong Elixir" (with two i's in Elixir.)

item.title: Is there an Item "Heartsong Elixer"
item.content:encoded:
The wiki lists both "Heartsong Elixir", which I know as a BvS consumable, and "Hearsong Elixer" (note the second "e" in Elixer), the latter is said to be an Instant Use Item.

I suspect the page about "Heartsong Elixer" (with 2 e's in Elixer) is a mistake and should be removed.
If not, then please forgive me for bringing this up.
